snippet: Sierra Boggess brings a little Broadway and a lot of other selections to her cabaret act at 54 Below.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Sierra Boggess at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Sierra Boggess brings a little Broadway and a lot of other selections to her cabaret act at 54 Below.

headline.main: Serenading Broadway, but Never Too Seriously
